A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This looks and feels like a Star Wars movie\, but be assured that the plot is not the much-repeated themes that we've seen before.  I greatly enjoyed going to see it\, but if you expect a repeat of Episodes IV\, V\, or VI\, you'll be disappointed.\n\nIt's visually stunning to say the least\, and I loved seeing what would happen in certain battle circumstances (sorry\, don't want to give too much away\, but you'll know what I mean when you see some of the space fighting scenes).
